title: October 6, 2010
content:
Today’s guest is F. <!--more--> William Engdahl and he has been one of our most important independent investigative scholars and authors who uncovers the hidden motives behind corporate globalization and geopolitics, oil, GMO foods, vaccine controversies and the global banking industry.
Living in Germany, William’s essays have been addressing crucial topics facing our world.
He is the author of the very important book “Seeds of Destruction: The Hidden Agenda of GMOs” that details how corporate control of the planet’s food sources, through the free market schemes, threatens humanity.
